label: Laboratory Equipment
description: Equipment and supplies used in scientific research and experimentation.
intents: Learn about laboratory equipment and their uses
Compare prices and features of laboratory equipment

subcategories.label: Homogenizers
subcategories.description: Equipment used to break down and mix samples for further analysis.

subcategories.label: Spectrophotometers
subcategories.description: Instruments used to measure the intensity of light in a sample.

subcategories.label: Thermal Cyclers
subcategories.description: Instruments used to amplify DNA through the polymerase chain reaction (PCR).

subcategories.label: HPLC
subcategories.description: High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) is a technique used to separate, identify, and quantify components in a mixture.

subcategories.label: Pipettes
subcategories.description: Laboratory tools used to measure and transfer small volumes of liquid.

subcategories.label: Flow Cytometry
subcategories.description: Technique used to analyze the physical and chemical characteristics of cells and particles in a fluid stream.

subcategories.label: Clean Rooms
subcategories.description: Controlled environments used in scientific research and manufacturing to minimize contamination.

subcategories.label: Microtomes
subcategories.description: Instruments used to cut thin sections of tissue for microscopic examination.

subcategories.label: Fermenters
subcategories.description: Equipment used for the growth and maintenance of microorganisms in a controlled environment.
